alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Bernard, east central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 900 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myrtle Grove, or 16 miles south of Belle Chasse, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Chasse, Myrtle Grove and Poydras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard
